processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8), @inputVATExists nvarchar(512), @inputVATDuplicate nvarchar(512), @checkInputVAT bit declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @general varchar(16), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @m int, @y int, @max1 int, @max2 int, @count int, @roundPrice int, @roundAmount int declare @tax varchar(16), @taxProperty varchar(3), @voucherTemplate varchar(32), @duplicateExRate nvarchar(512), @taxPost char(1) select @d0 = getdate(), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', '') , 1) select @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'm&Detail;$', @detail = 'd&Detail;$', @inquiry = 'i&Detail;$', @general = 'c&Detail;$000000', @tax = 'r&Tax;$', @voucherID = '&Code;' select @inputVATExists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s3; đã được cập nhật trong phần thuế đầu vào.' else '&s4; already exists in Input VAT data.' end select @inputVATDuplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s3; trùng nhau trong chi tiết thuế đầu vào.' else '&s4; already exists in Input VAT data.' end select @duplicateExRate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s3; có ngoại tệ hoặc tỷ giá nhập hơn một lần.' else '&s4;, currency or exchange rate already exists.' end select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Chứng từ số %s1 ngày %s2 tại dòng %s3 đã tồn tại.' else 'The voucher number %s1 dated %s2 at row %s3 already exists.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @taxProperty = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_tc_thue' select @voucherTemplate = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_mau_ct_dv' if not exists(select 1 from dmmauct where ma_mau_ct = @voucherTemplate) select @voucherTemplate = '' select @roundPrice = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_gia' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_kthd_tdv' and val = '1') select @checkInputVAT = 1 else select @checkInputVAT = 0 select @taxPost = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_post_tax_yn' select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master + '000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @max2 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @detail + '000000' and column_name = 'so_lsx' -- Checking &CommandCheckTaxCodeImport; update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)) &ImportOverwriteData; if @check$Unit <> '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end else begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C002' from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end if @r is not null and @$mode <> 1 begin if @check$Unit <> '1' select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r else select replace(replace(replace(replace(@duplicate$Unit, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', rtrim(ma_dvcs)), '%s4', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end -- Update update @@table set so_lsx = space(@max2 - len(ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)))) + ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)), ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, tk = case when a.tk <> '' then a.tk else b.tk end from @@table a left join dmkh b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #unit from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct from @@table group by ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; -- Checking @@checking(1); if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C010' from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #table b where a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.stt <> b.stt and (a.ty_gia <> b.ty_gia or a.ma_nt <> b.ma_nt)) &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #table b where a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.stt <> b.stt and (a.ty_gia <> b.ty_gia or a.ma_nt <> b.ma_nt)) if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@duplicateExRate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end -- Check Tax Detail @@checking(2); update @@table set mau_bc = '3' where ma_thue <> '' and mau_bc = '' update @@table set ma_tc = @taxProperty where ma_thue <> '' and ma_tc = '' update @@table set ma_mau_ct = @voucherTemplate where ma_thue <> '' and ma_mau_ct = '' update @@table set ma_kh_j = ma_kh where ma_thue <> '' and ma_kh_j = '' update @@table set tk_thue_no = case when a.tk_thue_no <> '' then a.tk_thue_no else b.tk_thue_no3 end from @@table a left join dmthue b on a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue where a.ma_thue <> '' update @@table set ten_kh_j = case when a.ten_kh_j <> '' then a.ten_kh_j else b.ten_kh end, dia_chi_j = case when a.dia_chi_j <> '' then a.dia_chi_j else b.dia_chi end, ma_so_thue = case when a.ma_so_thue <> '' then a.ma_so_thue else rtrim(b.ma_so_thue) end from @@table a left join dmkh b on a.ma_kh_j = b.ma_kh where a.ma_thue <> '' @@checking(3); -- Check Input VAT if @checkInputVAT = 1 begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct0', a.stt, 'C008' from @@table a join @@table b on a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue where a.ngay_ct <> b.ngay_ct or a.so_ct <> b.so_ct group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join @@table b on a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue where a.ngay_ct <> b.ngay_ct or a.so_ct <> b.so_ct group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@inputVATDuplicate, '%s1', so_ct0), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct0', a.stt, 'C009' from @@table a join ctgt30 b with (index(c)) on a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join ctgt30 b with (index(c)) on a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@inputVATExists, '%s1', so_ct0), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end end &ConfigDynamicImportChecking; &ImportOverwriteChecking;&EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a&ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, dien_giai, tk_no, tien_nt, tien, thue_nt, thue, ma_kh_i, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku into #d&Detail; from d&Detail;$000000 insert into #d&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.dien_giai_ct, a.tk_no, a.tien_nt, round(a.tien_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.t_thue_nt, round(a.t_thue_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.ma_kh_i, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt select top 0 stt_rec, status, ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_kh, dia_chi, dien_giai, loai_ct, tk, ma_nt, ty_gia, t_tien_nt, t_tien, t_thue_nt, t_thue into #m&Detail; from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #m&Detail; select b.stt_rec, @status, c.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_kh, isnull(e.dia_chi, ''), a.dien_giai, a.loai_ct, a.tk, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, d.t_tien_nt, d.t_tien, d.t_thue_nt, d.t_thue from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt join #unit c on a.ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = c.so_ct join (select stt_rec, sum(tien_nt) as t_tien_nt, sum(tien) as t_tien, sum(thue_nt) as t_thue_nt, sum(thue) as t_thue from #d&Detail; group by stt_rec) d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec left join dmkh e on a.ma_kh = e.ma_kh select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ma_dvcs, loai_ct, ngay_ct, so_ct, ngay_ct0, so_ct0, so_seri0, ma_thue, thue_suat, t_tien_nt, t_tien, t_thue_nt, t_thue, tk_thue_no, ma_nt, ty_gia, tk_du , mau_bc, ma_tc, ma_mau_ct, ma_kh as ma_kh_j, ten_kh as ten_kh_j, dia_chi as dia_chi_j, ma_so_thue, ma_kh2, ten_vt, ghi_chu, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku into #r&Tax; from r&Tax;$000000 insert into #r&Tax; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ma_dvcs, a.loai_ct, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ngay_ct0, a.so_ct0, a.so_seri0, a.ma_thue, isnull(d.thue_suat, 0), a.tien_nt, round(a.tien_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.t_thue_nt, round(a.t_thue_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.tk_thue_no, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, a.tk, a.mau_bc, a.ma_tc, a.ma_mau_ct, a.ma_kh_j, a.ten_kh_j, a.dia_chi_j, a.ma_so_thue, a.ma_kh2, a.ten_vt, a.ghi_chu, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_vv else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_bp else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.so_lsx else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_sp else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_hd else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_phi else '' end, case when @taxPost = '1' then a.ma_ku else '' end from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt where a.ma_thue <> '' order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i&Detail; from i&Detail;$000000 insert into #i&Detail; select stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_kh) + '#20$' + rtrim(tk) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_nt), '' from #m&Detail; select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', 'd$', 'tk_no, ma_kh_i', '#10$, #20$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert declare @p varchar(32), @masterTable varchar(32), @detailTable varchar(32), @taxTable varchar(32), @inquiryTable varchar(32), @insertKey varchar(128) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k while @r is not null begin select @m = m, @y = y from #k where y * 12 + m = @r select @p = rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0'), @insertKey = 'month(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@m) + ' and year(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@y) select @masterTable = @master + @p, @detailTable = @detail + @p, @taxTable = @tax + @p, @inquiryTable = @inquiry + @p select @q = @@inserting(master, @masterTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(detail, @detailTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q if exists(select 1 from #r&Tax;) begin select @q = @@inserting(tax, @taxTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q end select @q = @@inserting(inquiry, @inquiryTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q &ImportOverwriteInsertingByPart; select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k where y * 12 + m > @r end @@inserting(general); &ImportOverwriteInserting; if @status = '1' begin declare @fieldSelect varchar(4000) select @fieldSelect = 'stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ''' + @voucherID + ''' , ngay_ct, so_ct, t_tien_nt + t_thue_nt, t_tien + t_thue, ma_nt, ty_gia, dien_giai, ''' + @datetime0 + ''',' + rtrim(@user) exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostLater '#m&Detail;', @voucherID, @fieldSelect, '' end if @status <> '0' begin if exists(select 1 from #r&Tax;) begin @@inserting(inputTax); end select *, @voucherID as ma_ct, @datetime0 as datetime0, @datetime0 as datetime2, @user as user_id0, @user as user_id2, t_tien_nt + t_thue_nt as t_tt_nt, t_tien + t_thue as t_tt into #malloc from #m&Detail; exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$Allocation @voucherID, '0', '#malloc', '', 't_tt_nt', 't_tt', '', '', 'cttt50', 'ma_kh_i', '' select *, @voucherID as ma_ct, @datetime0 as datetime0, @datetime0 as datetime2, @user as user_id0, @user as user_id2, t_tien_nt + t_thue_nt as t_tt_nt, t_tien + t_thue as t_tt into #mallocloai3 from #m&Detail; where loai_ct = '3' select *, tien_nt as tt_nt, tien as tt into #dallocloai3 from #d&Detail; a where exists (select 1 from #m&Detail; b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and b.loai_ct = '3') exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$Allocation @voucherID, '', '#mallocloai3', '#dallocloai3', '0', '0', 'tt_nt', 'tt', 'cttt60', 'ma_kh_i', '', 0, 'tk_no' end if @status = '2' begin declare @glGroup varchar(128), @glAcctField varchar(128), @glAcctFieldRef varchar(128), @glAmountField varchar(128), @glFCAmountField varchar(128), @glKey varchar(512), @glNoAccList varchar(128), @glNoAccListRef varchar(128), @glGroups varchar(128) declare @External nvarchar(4000), @Statement nvarchar(4000), @Numeric varchar(4000), @String varchar(4000), @maxLineNumber int select @glAcctField = 'tk_no', @glAcctFieldRef = 'tk', @glAmountField = 'tien', @glFCAmountField = 'tien_nt', @glKey = '1=1', @glNoAccList = '0', @glNoAccListRef = '0', @glGroups = '1' select @Numeric = 'nam, ky, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, s4, s5, s6', @String = 'ma_nk, so_lo, ma_gd, so_dh, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3', @External = 'dien_giai_h = b.dien_giai, datetime0 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', datetime2 = ''' + @datetime0 + ''', user_id0 = ' + rtrim(@user) + ', user_id2 = ' + rtrim(@user), @Statement = '' select @glGroup = rtrim(groupby) from @@sysDatabaseName..voucherinfo where ma_ct = @voucherID select top 0 a.*, b.loai_ct, b.ma_kh, b.ma_kh as ma_kh_ref, cast(null as smalldatetime) as ngay_ct0, b.so_ct as so_ct0 into #dGL0 from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec insert into #dGL0 select a.*, b.loai_ct, b.ma_kh, b.ma_kh, null, '' from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec update #dGL0 set ma_kh = ma_kh_i, ma_kh_ref = ma_kh_i where loai_ct = '3' select a.*, b.ma_kh as ma_kh_ref, b.dien_giai into #glVAT from #r&Tax; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where a.t_thue_nt + a.t_thue <> 0 update #glVAT set ma_kh2 = '' where tk_thue_no in (select tk from dmtk where tk_cn = 0) update #glVAT set loai_ct = b.loai_ct, ma_kh_j = case when a.ma_kh2 <> '' then a.ma_kh2 else b.ma_kh end from #glVAT a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec select @maxLineNumber = max(line_nbr) from #dGL0 select @maxLineNumber = isnull(@maxLineNumber, 0) if @taxPost = '0' begin insert into #dGL0 (stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, loai_ct, so_ct, ngay_ct0, so_ct0, tk_no, tien_nt, tien, ma_kh, ma_kh_ref, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, dien_giai) select stt_rec, max(stt_rec0), @maxLineNumber + max(line_nbr), max(ngay_ct), max(loai_ct), max(so_ct), max(ngay_ct0), max(so_ct0), tk_thue_no, sum(t_thue_nt), sum(t_thue), ma_kh_j, ma_kh_ref, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', max(dien_giai) from #glVAT group by stt_rec, ma_kh_j, ma_kh_ref, tk_thue_no end else begin insert into #dGL0 (stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, loai_ct, so_ct, ngay_ct0, so_ct0, tk_no, tien_nt, tien, ma_kh, ma_kh_ref, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, dien_giai) select stt_rec, max(stt_rec0), @maxLineNumber + max(line_nbr), max(ngay_ct), max(loai_ct), max(so_ct), max(ngay_ct0), max(so_ct0), tk_thue_no, sum(t_thue_nt), sum(t_thue), ma_kh_j, ma_kh_ref, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, max(dien_giai) from #glVAT group by stt_rec, ma_kh_j, ma_kh_ref, tk_thue_no, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku end select a.*, b.tk, b.ma_dvcs, @voucherID as ma_ct, b.ngay_ct as ngay_lct, rtrim(@baseCurrency) as ma_nt, cast(1 as numeric(24, 12)) as ty_gia, a.dien_giai as dien_giai_h, cast('' as nvarchar(1024)) as ong_ba into #dGL from #dGL0 a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec exec AI_ERP$Voucher$Import$PostGL '#m&Detail;', '#dGL', @voucherID, @glAcctField, @glAcctFieldRef, @glAmountField, @glFCAmountField, @glKey, @glNoAccList, @glNoAccListRef, @glGroup, @Numeric, @String, @External, @Statement, '#k', @glGroups end
